mapper.sql: a.id,a.name,a.comments ,a.class_name className ,a.parent_table parentTable ,a.parent_table_fk parentTableFk ,a.create_by createBy ,a.create_date createDate ,a.update_by updateBy ,a.update_date updateDate ,a.remarks ,a.del_flag delFlag
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gen_table( id, name, comments, class_name, parent_table, parent_table_fk, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{comments}, #{className}, #{parentTable}, #{parentTableFk}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gen_table SET comments = #{comments}, class_name = #{className}, parent_table = #{parentTable}, parent_table_fk = #{parentTableFk}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
